definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: An organic sculpture, covered with a shiny silver color, will be designed as a natural cave in the middle of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 閃亮耀目的銀面有機大造形在中廳創造出天然的洞。

sentences.english: The new "floating platforms" surround the atrium without touching existing interior walls.
sentences.chinese: 新的“懸浮平臺”環繞中廳而成，並未接觸原有內牆。

sentences.english: I still have a few seats in the mezzanine.
On the left and right sides there are independent compounds for each families.
sentences.chinese: 中廳的兩邊是個個不同的院子，住着各個家庭分支。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1

definition: Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
Parish of Our Lady of Fatima (Macau)/Freguesia de Nossa Senhora de Fátima
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to give shelter from the wind and rain/to keep out the elements
you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); completely deserted
